channel.title: Slightly Edited Functions for New interface!

item.title: Slightly Edited Functions for New interface!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Thanks, and its not that your work is wasted, its just that the SRL devs are kinda perfectionists. Which isn’t a bad thing, its just that they have to make sure it works in all instances and is completely bug free. Thats not to say that your isnt bug-free, its just that the devs are very particular at what they put in SRL.

Again, these procedures will help people for the mean time, so good job on them

Read full topic

item.title: Slightly Edited Functions for New interface!
item.dc:creator: @OhMGee OhMGee
item.description:
@OhMGee wrote:

Here are a few

[scar]{*******************************************************************************
procedure SetFightMode(oFightMode : Integer);
By:
Description: GameTab 1 Related Functions. Sets Fightmode.
*******************************************************************************}
procedure SetFightMode(oFightMode : Integer);
begin
GameTab(1);
Wait(200 + Random(50));
if (oFightMode = 1) and (not (GetColor(565, 282) = 2303647)) then
Mouse(728, 487, 15, 8, True);
if (oFightMode = 2) and (not (GetColor(565, 323) = 2303647)) then
Mouse(814, 490, 15, 8, True);
if (oFightMode = 3) and (not (GetColor(565, 367) = 2303647)) then
Mouse(729, 537, 15, 8, True);
if (oFightMode = 4) and (not (GetColor(565, 411) = 2303647)) then
Mouse(812, 538, 15, 8, True);
end;

{*******************************************************************************
procedure Brightness(Intensity: String);
By: phantombmx
Description: Used to set the Screen Brightness to anything.
*******************************************************************************}
procedure Brightness(Intensity: String);
begin
GameTab(11)
case Lowercase(Intensity[1]) of
‘d’ : if (not (GetColor(738, 543)=16777215) )then
Mouse(738, 543, 5, 5, true)
‘n’ : if (not (GetColor(769, 543)=16777215)) then
Mouse(769, 543, 5, 5, true)
‘b’ : if (not (GetColor(800, 543)=16777215)) then
Mouse(800, 543, 5, 5, true)
‘v’ : if (not (GetColor(697, 254)=16777215)) then
Mouse(713, 329, 5, 5, true)
end;
end;

{*******************************************************************************
procedure SetChatEffects(Yes:boolean);
By: Bebemycat2
Description: If you want chat effects on/off
*******************************************************************************}
procedure SetChatEffects(Yes:boolean);
begin
GameTab(11);
case Yes of
true: MouseBox(775, 394,794, 413, 1);
False: MouseBox(777, 411,793, 428, 1);
end;
end;

{*****************************************************************************
procedure Retaliate(Yes: Boolean);
By: Spky | Fixed By: Freddy1990
Description: Sets auto retaliate on or off.
*****************************************************************************}
procedure Retaliate(Yes: Boolean);
begin
GameTab(1)
case Yes of
True : if(not(GetColor(567, 314) = 2070783))then MouseBox(564, 316, 593, 345, 1);
False : if(not(GetColor777, 565) = 2070783))then MouseBox(564, 316, 593, 345, 1);
end;
end;

{*******************************************************************************
procedure SetRun(run: Boolean);
By: RsN edited my OhMGee
Description: Sets Run on or off.
*******************************************************************************}
procedure SetRun(run: Boolean);
begin
GameTab(12);
case run of
True : if (not(GetColor(596, 228) = 65536)and
if (not(GetColor(596, 228)=461840 then
Mouse(597, 223, 5, 5, True);
False : if (not(GetColor(596, 237) = 65536)and
if (not(GetColor(596, 237)=461840 then
Mouse(595, 238, 5, 5, True);
end;

{*******************************************************************************
function LoggedIn: Boolean;
By: Stupid3ooo edited my OhMGee
Description: Returns True if Logged In.
*******************************************************************************}
function LoggedIn: Boolean;
begin
if (GetColor(638, 495) = 65536) then
Result := True;
end;
end;[/scar]

Read full topic
